title: Reestablishing jurisdiction
context: [ยง346-405] Reestablishing jurisdiction. A young adult who was previously under the jurisdiction of the court under this part and who was terminated from the young adult voluntary foster care program may reestablish jurisdiction by signing a new voluntary foster care agreement at which time the department and the court shall proceed pursuant to section 346-398. [L 2013, c 252, pt of ยง2]
